clean.description: It removes the target folder (It may not work if you need root!!!)

help.name: help
help.description: It shows the help of this command.

compose.description: It generates the docker-compose.yml file from the configured network.

help.name: help
help.description: It shows the help of this command.

reset.name: reset
reset.description: It resets the configuration generating a new one

user.name: user
user.description: User used to run the services in the docker-compose.yml file. "current" means the current user.

config.description: Command used to set up the configuration files and the nemesis block for the current network

help.name: help
help.description: It shows the help of this command.

assembly.name: assembly
assembly.description: An optional assembly type, example "dual" for testnet

customPreset.name: customPreset
customPreset.description: External preset file. Values in this file will override the provided presets (optional)

reset.name: reset
reset.description: It resets the configuration generating a new one

run.description: It boots the network via docker using the generated docker-compose.yml file and configuration. The config and compose methods/commands need to be called before this method. This is just a wrapper for docker-compose up bash call

help.name: help
help.description: It shows the help of this command.

daemon.name: daemon
daemon.description: If provided, docker-compose will run with -d (--detached) and this command will wait unit server is running before returning

build.name: build
build.description: If provided, docker-compose will run with -b (--build)

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: If running in daemon mode, how long before timing out (in MS)

start.description: Single command that aggregates config, compose and run in one liner!

help.name: help
help.description: It shows the help of this command.

reset.name: reset
reset.description: It resets the configuration generating a new one

user.name: user
user.description: User used to run the services in the docker-compose.yml file. "current" means the current user.

daemon.name: daemon
daemon.description: If provided, docker-compose will run with -d (--detached) and this command will wait unit server is running before returning

build.name: build
build.description: If provided, docker-compose will run with -b (--build)

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: If running in daemon mode, how long before timing out (in MS)

assembly.name: assembly
assembly.description: An optional assembly type, example "dual" for testnet

customPreset.name: customPreset
customPreset.description: External preset file. Values in this file will override the provided presets (optional)

stop.description: It stops the docker-compose network if running (symbol-bootstrap start with --daemon). This is just a wrapper for docker-compose down bash call.

help.name: help
help.description: It shows the help of this command.
